title: New York Natl Rare Backs Wanted
author: Maxjacks

posts.post_title: New York Natl Rare Backs Wanted
posts.post_content:
I have quite a few combos but I am always looking to grow my collection. If you have something you think I may like please shoot me an email. I may even have something nice to trade.



[url]Maxjcards@gmail.com[/url]

Here is what I already have, may be interested in upgrades but most interesting in new combos not found within the album
[url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/150243559@N04/albums/72157712689662706/[/url]
Bump please lmk what is out there.
